text:
Thanks. We should not rely on 'anecdotal evidence' of #inequity in #covid19 #vaccination access in #NYC.

Health Commish @DaveChokshi @NYCHealthy needs to post data on #vaccine access disaggregated for age, sex, race/ethnicity & work/home location.

Now.

https://t.co/5qzWtNLLuZ https://t.co/5Avgl1DdTe
